exit_steps.title: Revenue Notification (Ceasing Employment)
requirements: Cessation of employment notification from employer
exit_steps.notes: Ensure your employer registers your leave correctly on the Revenue system.

exit_steps.title: Claim Tax Refund (Form P50)
exit_steps.outcome: Potential tax refund for the current year
exit_steps.notes: Useful if you are leaving mid-year and will not be working in Ireland for the rest of the year.
